description.en: Published in issue 2015-6 of Jump NEXT! on December 28, 2015, 47 pages.

biography.en:
**Name** (in native language)
戸塚慶文
**Associated Names**
TOTSUKA Yoshifumi
**Birth Date**
August 5, 1989

---
In 2013, at the age of 24, he won the 78th Shonen Jump’s Treasure Newcomer Manga Award for "Space Tourism Sea Ark", FURUDATE Haruichi was the judge at the time.

His top 3 Gundam series are SD Gundam, Kidou Senshi Gundam - Gyakushuu no Char and Kidou Senshi Gundam F91.
His favorite manga is HUNTER x HUNTER.
He likes playing Yu-Gi-Oh! card game and fighting games such as Street Fighter series.
